lyrics.text:
Ko Sihova ko e ‘Eiki
‘O e langi mo māmani;
‘Oku fai mā’oni’oni,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.

Ko hotau ‘Otua ia,
Ke tau manavahē ki ai
Ko hotau mo’ui’anga,
Ke tau fa’a kumi ki ai.

Pea ‘oku māfimafi,
‘A e Eiki, ko Sihova;
‘Oku pule fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki he me’a kotoa pē.

Ke fai fakafeta’i ma’u pē,
Ki he ‘Otua mo’oni
‘E he kakai kotoa pē,
‘Oku nofo ‘i māmani.
